fullDescription.intro: Uses the ops.epo.org service to download the applicants, inventors, title and abstract of a patent, given its country/docnumber/kind code. Supports OAuth2 authentication, if the user has a valid consumer key and consumer secret.
fullDescription.option: Consumer Key used for OAuth2 Authentication.
Consumer Secret used for OAuth2 Authentication.
The Country code of the patent (US, WO, ...)
The DocNumber of the patent (in docdb format)
The Kind code of the patent (A1, ...)

ports.outPort: All applicants, inventors, the title and abstract of a patent.
